duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop procurement documents and manage procurement processes for capital and major procurements.
Assist in the development of new solicitations and contracts for capital services, including alternative delivery methods.
Participate in working groups to assess best practices for alternative delivery procurements.
Coordinate with functional areas for the development of capital procurement documents.
Support preparations to respond to RFIs, prepare proposer communications, and support proposer meetings.
Plan procurements, set pre-award schedules for contracts, and request quotes.
Prepare solicitation documents for Invitations for Bids, Requests for Proposals, and Requests for Qualifications.
Coordinate Pre-Bid/Proposal meetings, present projects and solicitations to potential bidders/proposers.
Prepare draft award recommendations, Board Reports, and required reports and correspondence.
Monitor all aspects of contract compliance and perform other related duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Juris Doctor Degree + 3 years of relevant experience
